entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
